snippet.title: Endling // Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
#Endling #ExtinctionIsForever #Survival #EcoGame

Will the last mother fox on Earth be able to save its three little cubs?

Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/898890/Endling/

Experience what life would be like in a world ravaged by mankind through the eyes of the last fox on Earth in this eco-conscious adventure. Discover the destructive force of the human race, as it corrupts, pollutes and exploits the most precious and valuable resources of the natural environments day after day. Explore Endling’s 3D side-scrolling world and defend your cubs, three tiny and defenseless fur balls, feed them, watch them grow level after level, notice their unique personalities and fears, and most importantly, help them survive. Use the cover of night to stealthily guide your litter towards a safer place. Spend the day resting in an improvised shelter and plan your next movement carefully since it could be the last for you and your pups.

• Explore devastated environments based on real current issues.
• Hunt other animals to feed your cubs and avoid becoming the prey.
• Put your survival instinct to the test and get involved in emotionally taxing decisions.
• Bring your pups to the last safe place where humans cannot harm them.
• Care for your kits, feed them, and teach them new skills to make them less vulnerable. 
• Survive!

#HerobeatStudios #HandyGames

Developed by Herobeat Studios
